item.title: Report X-2024100436
item.description:
Report X-2024100436

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-05T09:31:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-01
  • City: EAGAN
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE DESTINED TO ALASKA THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED A 10 OUNCE AEROSOL CAN OF FLAMMABLE MOROCCANOIL LUMINOUS HAIRSPRAY. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024091770
item.description:
Report X-2024091770

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-01T09:15:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-25
  • City: MANKATO
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The package was located in the belly of the trailer leaking onto several other packages. The package contains no paint clips or Ltd Qty markings. The can that leaked was the fast cure activator. Returning the cans that did not leak to the shipper. Cans were securely taped to prevent any additional leakage along with markings.
